By the way, the way I posted the command its an admin command, to change that from admin to owner just change the playerrights >= 2 to 3

item.title: How make my levels 700
item.dc:creator: @tj007razor tj007razor
item.description:
@tj007razor wrote:

Ok find all your commands and add this one

if (command.startsWith("maxstats") && playerRights >= 2) { // name of command....can change to what you want int maxLvl = 700; // You can change this to 999 if you want for (int i = 0; i < playerXP.length; i++) { playerLevel[0] = maxLvl; playerLevel[1] = maxLvl; playerLevel[2] = maxLvl; playerLevel[3] = maxLvl; playerLevel[4] = maxLvl; playerLevel[5] = maxLvl; playerLevel[6] = maxLvl; playerLevel[7] = maxLvl; playerLevel[8] = maxLvl; playerLevel[9] = maxLvl; playerLevel[10] = maxLvl; playerLevel[11] = maxLvl; playerLevel[12] = maxLvl; playerLevel[13] = maxLvl; playerLevel[14] = maxLvl; playerLevel[15] = maxLvl; playerLevel[16] = maxLvl; playerLevel[17] = maxLvl; playerLevel[18] = maxLvl; playerLevel[19] = maxLvl; playerLevel[20] = maxLvl; playerLevel[21] = maxLvl; playerXP[i] = getXPForLevel(maxLvl); setSkillLevel(i, playerLevel[i], playerXP[i]); } }

item.title: How make my levels 700
item.dc:creator: @tj007razor tj007razor
item.description:
@tj007razor wrote:

max xp is 2147483647, because its an int. To change your level, just edit your charactor file, you dont need the xp to change it, but if you must use 2147483647 and lvl is either 135 or 136 for that.

item.title: How make my levels 700
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

Search for this in client.JAVA

return MAX LEVEL HERE;

Obviously you’d change the ‘MAX LEVEL HERE’ to whatever the max level is on you’re server. You should see something like this. Change the ‘MAX LEVEL HERE’ to 700, save client.JAVA and compile.

[code] public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0;

	for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= MAX LEVEL HERE; lvl++) {
		points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 150.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
		output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
		if (output >= exp) {
			return lvl;
		}
	}
	return MAX LEVEL HERE;
}[/code]

Read full topic
